file.name: contract.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Auth API
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
  description: Auth API Specs
  contact:
    name: BC Registries
paths:
  '/entities/{businessIdentifier}/authorizations':
    get:
      summary: Get authorizations for the entity
      operationId: getAuthorizations
      tags:
        - authorization
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          headers:
            X-Application-Context:
              schema:
                type: string
              description: X-Application-Context
              examples:
                owner:
                  value: 'application:prod'
                admin:
                  value: 'application:prod'
                member:
                  value: 'application:prod'
                staff:
                  value: 'application:prod'
            Access-Control-Allow-Origin:
              schema:
                type: string
              description: Access-Control-Allow-Origin
              examples:
                owner:
                  value: '*'
                admin:
                  value: '*'
                member:
                  value: '*'
                unauthorized:
                  value: '*'
                staff:
                  value: '*'
            Access-Control-Allow-Methods:
              schema:
                type: string
              description: Access-Control-Allow-Methods
              examples:
                owner:
                  value: 'GET, OPTIONS'
                admin:
                  value: 'GET, OPTIONS'
                member:
                  value: 'GET, OPTIONS'
                unauthorized:
                  value: 'GET, OPTIONS'
                staff:
                  value: 'GET, OPTIONS'
            Access-Control-Allow-Headers:
              schema:
                type: string
              description: Access-Control-Allow-Headers
              examples:
                owner:
                  value: 'Content-Type, api_key, Authorization'
                admin:
                  value: 'Content-Type, api_key, Authorization'
                member:
                  value: 'Content-Type, api_key, Authorization'
                unauthorized:
                  value: 'Content-Type, api_key, Authorization'
                staff:
                  value: 'Content-Type, api_key, Authorization'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Authorization'
              examples:
                owner:
                  value:
                    orgMembership: ADMIN
                    roles:
                      - view
                      - edit
                admin:
                  value:
                    orgMembership: COORDINATOR
                    roles:
                      - view
                      - edit
                member:
                  value:
                    orgMembership: USER
                    roles:
                      - view
                      - edit
                unauthorized:
                  value: {}
                staff:
                  value:
                    roles:
                      - view
                      - edit
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
      description: Get authorizations endpoint for the entity by business indentifier
    parameters:
      - schema:
          type: string
        name: businessIdentifier
        in: path
        required: true
        description: Corp Num/Incorporation Number of the entity
        examples:
          owner:
            value: CP0001234
          admin:
            value: CP0001235
          member:
            value: CP0001236
          staff:
            value: CP0001237
          unauthorized:
            value: CP0000000
components:
  schemas:
    ErrorResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
          description: Identifier representing the type of error that occurred.
        message:
          type: string
          description: Description of the error.
      description: Contains details of an error that was encountered.
      x-examples: {}
    Authorization:
      title: Authorization
      type: object
      description: Authorization Model
      properties:
        orgMembership:
          type: string
          enum:
            - USER
            - COORDINATOR
            - ADMIN
        roles:
          type: array
          items: {}
      required:
        - roles
      x-tags:
        - authorization
      x-examples:
        owner:
          role: ADMIN
          value:
            roles:
              - view
              - edit
            orgMembership: ADMIN
        admin:
          role: COORDINATOR
          value:
            roles:
              - view
              - edit
            orgMembership: COORDINATOR
        member:
          role: USER
          value:
            roles:
              - view
              - edit
            orgMembership: USER
        staff:
          role: STAFF
          value:
            roles:
              - view
              - edit
  securitySchemes:
    API Key:
      name: API Key
      type: apiKey
      in: query
servers:
  - description: Microcks URL
    url: 'https://mock-lear-tools.pathfinder.gov.bc.ca/rest/Auth+API/1.0.0'
